channel.title: Week 2 on Grutto Archeologie
channel.description: Recent content in Week 2 on Grutto Archeologie

item.title: Week 2 - ARCHIS and Everything Archaeology!
item.description:
During this week, we got to look into the ARCHIS (Het Archeologisch Informatiesysteem) database which basically contains all information of archaeological activity that takes place in the Netherlands.

We downloaded and looked at information from version 3 of ARCHIS, which is the latest version. Before we bore you with additional details, here is a visual condensed overview of what we got out of the data:
